short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hidden clues, sharper mind!  Find Cookie & boost your brain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to ‘Where's Cookie!’ This engaging game is not just about fun – it's a brain-boosting adventure. 

As you search for Cookie, our adorable hidden dog, on website pages, you're actually enhancing your cognitive skills. 

Each level is designed to improve your attention to detail, speed up your visual processing, and sharpen your observational abilities. Enjoy the thrill of the hunt while giving your brain a beneficial workout. 

Ready to play and train your brain with Cookie? Let's get started!
